text: Salli Karuna (1902–1987) was a Finnish film actress.Hammer p.117 She was married to the actor Ilmari Unho. ==Selected filmography== * Gabriel, Come Back (1951) * Mother or Woman (1953) == References == == Bibliography == * Tad Bentley Hammer. International film prizes: an encyclopedia. title: Salli Karuna
